name: Corrupt - Political Simulator
description: Your wildest dreams will become reality in this political strategy and simulation game that shall introduce you into the evershifting maze that is the world known to a corrupt oligarch.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 820M 2048MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
